meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>short</kanji> <kanji>sword</kanji> is the <vocabulary>short sword</vocabulary>. What's another word for a short sword? It's a <vocabulary>dagger</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
